intro: Lagenocarpus rigidus f. robustior, commonly known as the robust lagenocarpus, is a variant of the lagenocarpus genus, which belongs to the family Araliaceae. This plant is characterized by its thick, rigid stems and broad, leathery leaves that are typically dark green in color. It is native to tropical regions and thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are usually white or pale yellow, followed by small, berry-like fruits. Its botanical features make it a unique and ornamental plant in botanical gardens and greenhouse settings.
